text: Benny Johansson (born 8 May 1947) is a former Swedish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. In 1972 he was part of the Swedish team which finished seventh in the Olympic tournament. He played all six matches and scored eight goals. ==References== Sports Reference Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Sweden Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Benny Johansson
